La historia nos mostraba c\u00f3mo Goku volv\u00eda por una maldici\u00f3n a su m\u00e1s tierna infancia (aunque conservando todo su poder) y, acompa\u00f1ado por Trunks (hijo de Vegeta y Bulma) y Pan, nieta del propio protagonista, deb\u00eda volver a su tama\u00f1o normal recuperando las siete Bolas de Drag\u00f3n. Consta de varias etapas: Dragones, Baby Vegeta y Super-17.","broadcast":"finalized","cast":[{"name":"Stephanie Nadolny","role":"Young Goku","images":null,"id":35398},{"name":"Elise Baughman","role":"Pan","images":null},{"name":"Andrew Chandler","role":"Narrator","images":null,"id":35390},{"name":"Masako Nozawa","role":"Son Goku","images":{"face":"\/c7\/b8\/c7b8918c154922088fb2acb7b1a15a53.jpg"},"id":10050},{"name":"Y\u00fbko Minaguchi","role":"Pan","images":{"face":"\/00\/19\/0019331f27a2165a618123f78f50963a.jpg"},"id":10046},{"name":"J\u00f4ji Yanami","role":"Narrator","images":{"face":"\/dd\/a1\/dda12c5e5f3e07b539274bd5acdec079.jpg"},"id":10042},{"name":"Caitlynne Medrek","role":"Pan","images":{"face":"\/06\/15\/0615d9167f19d33d23bd9dcde1c1edde.jpg"},"id":35392},{"name":"Eric Vale","role":"Trunks","images":null,"id":35394},{"name":"Takeshi Kusao","role":"Trunks","images":null,"id":42340},{"name":"Sonny Strait","role":"Giru","images":null}],"genres":["Animation","Action","Adventure","Comedy","Fantasy","Sci-fi","Thriller"],"distributor":null,"numInteractions":68902,"numRatings":15743,"ratingHistogram":{"1":248,"2":316,"3":1804,"4":5300,"5":8075},"seasonsBlocked":[1],"producers":[{"name":"Bird Studios","images":null},{"name":"Toei Animation","images":null,"id":217411},{"name":"Toei Company","images":null}],"writers":[{"name":"Andrew Rye","images":null},{"name":"Akira Toriyama","images":null,"id":37272},{"name":"Eric Vale","images":null,"id":35394}],"countries":["JP"],"directors":[{"name":"Minoru Okazaki","images":null}],"composer":null,"seasons":[{"seasonNum":1,"episodes":[{"idm":38866,"mediaType":5,"name":"Unas Misteriosas Esferas Del Dragon Aparecen","plot":"La Pan i en Guiru aterren al planeta Luud i amb el radar localitzen la bola de drac de sis estrelles. La Pan entra dins del temple de Luud, per\u00f2 acaba convertida en una nina a mans del sacerdot Mutxi-Motxi. En Son Goku i en Trunks, que aviat arribaran amb els germans Par\u00e0-Par\u00e0, encara no han descobert la veritable forma del malvat sacerdot.","images":null,"runtime":1,"artwork":{"backdrops":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null},"posters":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null}},"seasonNum":1,"episodeNum":1,"availability":{"vodSummary":null,"vod":null,"scheduleSummary":null,"schedule":null,"vodBestOffer":null,"vodUserOffers":[]},"watched":false},{"idm":38867,"mediaType":5,"name":"Goku, Trunks y Pan viajan al espacio","plot":"Mentre en Son Goku i en Trunks continuen lluitant contra el monstre Mutxi, el misteri\u00f3s Deltaki, l\u00edder de la secta Luud, s'apodera de la Pan. Aviat se sabr\u00e0 que el Luud \u00e9s un d\u00e9u en forma de robot que controla en Deltaki, i en Son Goku i en Trunks es veuran obligats a convertir-se en superguerrers per destruir el malvat sacerdot.","images":null,"runtime":24,"artwork":{"backdrops":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null},"posters":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null}},"seasonNum":1,"episodeNum":2,"availability":{"vodSummary":null,"vod":null,"scheduleSummary":null,"schedule":null,"vodBestOffer":null,"vodUserOffers":[]},"watched":false},{"idm":38868,"mediaType":5,"name":"Los comerciantes del planeta Imegga","plot":"Despr\u00e9s d'haver reunit prou energia per activar el Luud, comen\u00e7a l'atac contra en Son Goku i en Trunks. Aleshores, en Mu, un misteri\u00f3s cient\u00edfic, en veure que el Luud no podr\u00e0 derrotar els dos superguerrers, ordena a en Deltaki que faci que el robot absorbeixi la Pan, la qual cosa li permetr\u00e0 aconseguir m\u00e9s energia per v\u00e8ncer en Goku i en Trunks.","images":null,"runtime":24,"artwork":{"backdrops":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null},"posters":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null}},"seasonNum":1,"episodeNum":3,"availability":{"vodSummary":null,"vod":null,"scheduleSummary":null,"schedule":null,"vodBestOffer":null,"vodUserOffers":[]},"watched":false},{"idm":38869,"mediaType":5,"name":"Los criminales mas buscados","plot":"En Son Goku i en Trunks continuen lluitant contra el temible Luud. Els germans es posen en contacte amb en Son Goku telep\u00e0ticament i preparen una estrat\u00e8gia conjunta per destruir un robot que sembla invencible.","images":null,"runtime":24,"artwork":{"backdrops":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null},"posters":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null}},"seasonNum":1,"episodeNum":4,"availability":{"vodSummary":null,"vod":null,"scheduleSummary":null,"schedule":null,"vodBestOffer":null,"vodUserOffers":[]},"watched":false},{"idm":38870,"mediaType":5,"name":"Redic, un tipo duro","plot":"En Trunks proposa tornar a la Terra per substituir la Pan per en Son Goten, per\u00f2 abans faran parada en un planeta desert, on en Guiru hi ha localitzat una altra bola de drac. La Pan, molt enfadada, intentar\u00e0 buscar la bola tota sola, fet que tindr\u00e0 unes conseq\u00fc\u00e8ncies que podrien ser molt tr\u00e0giques. D'altra banda, el general Rild, m\u00e0 dreta del doctor Mu, acaba desfent-se d'en Deltaki.","images":{"backdrop":"\/4a\/ae\/4aae5975024a01db2c510d16331876e8.jpg","country":"XX","poster":null},"runtime":24,"artwork":{"backdrops":{"original":"https:\/\/img.tviso.com\/XX\/backdrop\/original\/4a\/ae\/4aae5975024a01db2c510d16331876e8.jpg","large":"https:\/\/img.tviso.com\/XX\/backdrop\/w600\/4a\/ae\/4aae5975024a01db2c510d16331876e8.jpg","small":"https:\/\/img.tviso.com\/XX\/backdrop\/w300\/4a\/ae\/4aae5975024a01db2c510d16331876e8.jpg"},"posters":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null}},"seasonNum":1,"episodeNum":15,"availability":{"vodSummary":null,"vod":null,"scheduleSummary":null,"schedule":null,"vodBestOffer":null,"vodUserOffers":[]},"watched":false},{"idm":38881,"mediaType":5,"name":"La Traici\u00f3n de Giru","plot":"En Guiru conven\u00e7 en Trunks de passar pel seu planeta natal, el planeta m\u00e0quina M2. L'aparici\u00f3 de milers de robots id\u00e8ntics a en Guiru i, posteriorment, del grup Megacan\u00f3 Sigma, fa que en Son Goku, en Trunks i la Pan descobreixin que en Guiru \u00e9s un tra\u00efdor que treballa a les ordres del general Rild, m\u00e0 dreta del doctor Mu.","images":null,"runtime":24,"artwork":{"backdrops":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null},"posters":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null}},"seasonNum":1,"episodeNum":16,"availability":{"vodSummary":null,"vod":null,"scheduleSummary":null,"schedule":null,"vodBestOffer":null,"vodUserOffers":[]},"watched":false},{"idm":38882,"mediaType":5,"name":"Los Planes de Ryuu","plot":"Despr\u00e9s d'haver capturat en Son Goku i en Trunks, els robots els analitzen i descobreixen que tenen una for\u00e7a extraordin\u00e0ria. La Pan, molt enfadada per la tra\u00efci\u00f3 d'en Guiru, decideix disfressar-se de robot per entrar a l'amagatall del grup Megacan\u00f3 Sigma, uns robots que tenen el poder de travessar parets i informaci\u00f3 privilegiada dels nostres herois.","images":null,"runtime":24,"artwork":{"backdrops":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null},"posters":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null}},"seasonNum":1,"episodeNum":17,"availability":{"vodSummary":null,"vod":null,"scheduleSummary":null,"schedule":null,"vodBestOffer":null,"vodUserOffers":[]},"watched":false},{"idm":38883,"mediaType":5,"name":"Comienza la Lucha","plot":"En Trunks aconsegueix fugir de l'amagatall del grup Megacan\u00f3 Sigma amb la Pan i quan arriben a la nau descobreixen que en Guiru els ha robat les boles de drac. Mentrestant, en Son Goku s'encarrega de destruir els tres robots que encara queden sencers, davant de la mirada atenta del general Rild, que aviat podria entrar en acci\u00f3.","images":null,"runtime":24,"artwork":{"backdrops":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null},"posters":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null}},"seasonNum":1,"episodeNum":18,"availability":{"vodSummary":null,"vod":null,"scheduleSummary":null,"schedule":null,"vodBestOffer":null,"vodUserOffers":[]},"watched":false},{"idm":38884,"mediaType":5,"name":"El Amo de los Androides","plot":"En Son Goku arriba a la nau just abans que el general Rild, que converteix en Trunks en un bloc met\u00e0l\u00b7lic i l'envia al laboratori del doctor Mu perqu\u00e8 el dissequi. Mentre la Pan intenta salvar-lo, en Son Goku, convertit aquest cop en superguerrer, inicia una batalla amb en Rild, que aviat tamb\u00e9 patir\u00e0 una transformaci\u00f3 per convertir-se en l'hipermega Rild.","images":null,"runtime":24,"artwork":{"backdrops":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null},"posters":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null}},"seasonNum":1,"episodeNum":19,"availability":{"vodSummary":null,"vod":null,"scheduleSummary":null,"schedule":null,"vodBestOffer":null,"vodUserOffers":[]},"watched":false},{"idm":38885,"mediaType":5,"name":"El Ataque de Ryuu","plot":"En Son Goku, que continua lluitant contra l'hipermega Rild, descobreix el seu poder secret. En Rild \u00e9s capa\u00e7 de manipular tot el metall del planeta. Aix\u00f2 li permet apar\u00e8ixer a tot arreu on hi ha metall i el fa indestructible. Mentrestant, la Pan intenta infiltrar-se a la torre principal per acabar amb en Guiru i recuperar les boles de drac.","images":null,"runtime":24,"artwork":{"backdrops":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null},"posters":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null}},"seasonNum":1,"episodeNum":20,"availability":{"vodSummary":null,"vod":null,"scheduleSummary":null,"schedule":null,"vodBestOffer":null,"vodUserOffers":[]},"watched":false},{"idm":38886,"mediaType":5,"name":"Goku es Derrotado","plot":"Mentre la Pan informa a en Son Goku que ha recuperat les boles de drac, en Rild aprofita per convertir-los a tots dos en blocs de metall, igual que a en Trunks, i els trasllada tamb\u00e9 al laboratori del doctor Mu. Aleshores apareix en Guiru i allibera la Pan i en Son Goku, per\u00f2 no t\u00e9 la mateixa sort amb en Trunks, que t\u00e9 una sorpresa preparada per a tothom.","images":null,"runtime":24,"artwork":{"backdrops":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null},"posters":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null}},"seasonNum":1,"episodeNum":21,"availability":{"vodSummary":null,"vod":null,"scheduleSummary":null,"schedule":null,"vodBestOffer":null,"vodUserOffers":[]},"watched":false},{"idm":38887,"mediaType":5,"name":"El Despertar de Baby","plot":"Despr\u00e9s de saber que en Guiru tamb\u00e9 havia alliberat en Trunks abans que arrib\u00e9s al laboratori, descobrim la gran creaci\u00f3 del doctor Mu: el neomutant Baby, un enemic ple de sorpreses. Aviat sabrem que \u00e9s ell el que ha utilitzat el doctor Mu, i tot fa pensar que aquesta nova criatura t\u00e9 una pila de perills amagats.","images":null,"runtime":24,"artwork":{"backdrops":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null},"posters":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null}},"seasonNum":1,"episodeNum":22,"availability":{"vodSummary":null,"vod":null,"scheduleSummary":null,"schedule":null,"vodBestOffer":null,"vodUserOffers":[]},"watched":false},{"idm":38888,"mediaType":5,"name":"Un Invitado Misterioso","plot":"Despr\u00e9s de v\u00e8ncer en Rild, en Son Goku, en Trunks, la Pan i en Guiru localitzen una altra bola de drac en una nau abandonada. Es tracta de la bola de drac d'una estrella. La Pan tamb\u00e9 hi troba un nen malferit i se l'enduen a la seva nau per portar-lo a l'hospital d'un altre planeta. Despr\u00e9s d'intentar en va de destruir en Baby, en Son Goku, en Trunks i la Pan fugen amb la seva nau, sense haver pogut localitzar el malvat Baby.","images":null,"runtime":24,"artwork":{"backdrops":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null},"posters":{"original":null,"large":null,"small":null}},"seasonNum":1,"episodeNum":24,"availability":{"vodSummary":null,"vod":null,"scheduleSummary":null,"schedule":null,"vodBestOffer":null,"vodUserOffers":[]},"watched":false},{"idm":38890,"mediaType":5,"name":"Baby Llega a la Tierra","plot":"En Son Goku, en Trunks i la Pan troben la bola de drac de set estrelles i ja nom\u00e9s els en queden dues per aconseguir el seu objectiu.
